Jerry Weinberg Papers ALBA.115

Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Jerry Weinberg Papers
Weinberg, Jerry
ALBA.115
0.25 Linear Feet (1 box)
undated
Scope and Contents
This collection consists of approximately two dozen letters from Jerry Weinberg to Ben Lederman (most from the Spanish Civil War, the remainder from WWII), and two letters from Lederman to Weinberg.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives for more information and to schedule an appointment, tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu or 212-998-2630.
